title: InputStream.transferTo()
summary: Copy an InputStream to an OutputStream in one call.
explanation: transferTo() reads all bytes from the input stream and writes them to the output stream. No buffer management, no loop. It uses an optimized internal buffer.

whyModernWins.title: One line
whyModernWins.desc: Replace the entire read/write loop with one method call.

whyModernWins.title: Optimized
whyModernWins.desc: Internal buffer size is tuned for performance.

whyModernWins.title: No bugs
whyModernWins.desc: No off-by-one errors in buffer management.
